cont.entity_a: Lack of instructions was a significant issue, leading to testing errors. Some kits were missing instructions, requiring online searches. Easy to use with clear directions when instructions are available.
cont.entity_b: Instructions can be unclear, leading to potential errors. Instructions were clear, and results arrived promptly.

cont.entity_a: The kit only contained one pack instead of the two mentioned.
cont.entity_b: Some kits lacked necessary components, making them unusable.

cont.entity_a: The kit is easy to order and use, with fast result turnaround.
cont.entity_b: The kit is easy to use but requires careful adherence to instructions.

Results.comm: Results were consistent with professional testing.

cont.entity_a: Results were quick and detailed. Test results were consistent with professional service results. Test kit worked as advertised and results were emailed quickly.
cont.entity_b: Results are detailed and emailed quickly when expedited shipping is used. Test results can vary greatly between tests. Some tests returned inconclusive results due to shipping issues.

cont.entity_a: Customer service was difficult to reach. The lab was helpful in resolving issues with missing results.
No extra fees beyond shipping to the lab. Shipping cost can exceed the cost of the test kit itself.
cont.entity_b: Test kits often do not include prepaid return envelopes, adding to cost.

cont.entity_a: High margin of error may necessitate retesting for borderline results. Consumer Reports indicated low accuracy and reliability.
cont.entity_b: Test kits can be inaccurate, as indicated by inconsistent results.

cont.entity_a: Reports are detailed and include future instructions.

cont.entity_b: User errors often result in invalid tests.
The kit is misleading about included costs and fees.
